message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to me and I believe it will be valuable to you too. Considering its quality and benefits, I propose a price of $110 for it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is a bit too high for me right now. I'm willing to pay $95 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
